page.title: 19A CHILD'S SATURDAY, LIMERIGG
page.content: There is no school at the weekend so on Saturdays I don't get up until between half-past eight and half-past nine. I dress at ten o'oclock and I watch television until 11.30am. Then I go down to my gran's,because my mum is out collecting milk money from customers in Slamannan. When my mum finishes,she comes to my gran's where she counts the money and has her lunch. At about 3.30pm. my mum,gran and myself go to Falkirk which is a large town about 11km. from Limerigg. We go there every Saturday. We go to many of the shops including the supermarkets. We return home about 5.30pm. then we have our dinner at my gran's. Two hours later we go home to our own house and I watch the television until it is supper time. Then I make the tea for my mum and afterwards I go to bed.
